page.title: 02Homelife Pets
page.content: Out of 126 families in Mudeford School 33 have no pets the rest have pets as follows:-38 dogs,29 cats,16 rabbits,12 hamsters,6 gerbils,4 tortoises,4 tropical fish,4 budgies,3 guinea pigs,3 aviaries,3 canaries,2 cockatiels,2 ponies,2 mice,1 chicken.Jamie R. is 5.He says"Every time we go near him my guinea pig is frightened.He goes into the other part of the hutch.We have only had him a few weeks.He is getting used to me.We took him into the house the other day. He has little claws.I haven't seen his eyes yet.He has black fur over them." Jamie M. is 5.He says"Mummy brings my dog to meet me from school.He is a golden labrador.He chases after me in the back garden when he wants me to throw his ball."
